授業目的: This course will focus on English reading and writing for academic purposes with a special emphasis on developing critical thinking along with language skills. Students will learn selected vocabulary words from the Oxford 3000 and the Academic Word List and review grammar for use in writing assignments.
到達目標: By the end of this course, students will have acquired the ability to read texts for main ideas and details, recognize different text types, predict content, make inferences about texts, analyze text structure and features, write paragraphs of different genres, plan before writing (make an outline), revise, edit, and rewrite, give feedback and self-assess.
特記事項:
本授業科目は、“オンライン授業60単位制限対象科目”ではありません。
The course is not subject to the 60-credit limit for online courses.
授業方法: This course will be held in-person on campus unless emergency events related to the pandemic force a change of format. General features: Discussion, reading aloud, guided skills-development exercises, written and oral feedback on assignments.
